scripts.up:local:proxy:build: cross-env NODE_ENV=development && yarn build:web && yarn up:local:proxy -- --build
scripts.up:prod:build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production && yarn build:web && yarn up:prod -- --build
scripts.web: cd ./web && cross-env NODE_ENV=development PORT=3001 && yarn start
scripts.server: cd ./server && export NODE_ENV=development PORT=3000 && yarn dev
scripts.install:prod: yarn install && yarn install:web && yarn build:server
